name: The Chirp of Courage
description:
A submission for the mini jam 125 with signals as a theme. Talks about a way that coal miners signal if there are issues in the mine... Thanks to Pico-8 I was able to unleash my creativity. 

Directions: Arrow Keys to move around, and press X to board/unboard the train at designated stops. There is a determined ending.

I tried to incorporate signals in a few ways:

1. You are able to control the train at the signals.

2. The color of the flowers are a signal of their environment.

3. There is a storyline about a coal mine that I'm not going to spoil!
